subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: A strained right wrist tendon will sideline Mark Teixeira for 8 to 10 weeks and leave the Yankees with a hole in the middle of their lineup for the first month of the season.
snippet: A strained right wrist tendon will sideline Mark Teixeira for 8 to 10 weeks and leave the Yankees with a hole in the middle of their lineup for the first month of the season.
